sentences.en: A victory for Allende would imperil our interests in the Western Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 阿连德一旦获胜,就将危及我们在西半球的利益.

sentences.en: But the problems of the western hemisphere remained acute.
sentences.cn: 但是,西半球的问题仍然是尖锐的.

sentences.en: Cold water may be upwelled or may be advected into the winter hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 冷水可以涌开或者可以平流到冬半球.

sentences.en: In most people, the left hemisphere is bigger than the right.
sentences.cn: 多数人的左脑比右脑大。

sentences.en: In the Northern Hemisphere, the western portions of continents are especially favored by the prevailing winds.
sentences.cn: 在北半球, 大陆西部地区尤受多风之惠.

sentences.en: Other growers in the northern hemisphere have planted less.
sentences.cn: 而北半球小麦生产国种植面积较少。

sentences.en: Such storms spin counterclockwise in the Northern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 这种旋暴风在北半球是作逆时针方向旋转.

sentences.en: The Northern Hemisphere Hadley cell now overlaps 1000 km into the Southern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 这时,北半球哈得来环流圈伸进南半球约1000公里.

sentences.en: The Northern Hemisphere owes its climate to the North Atlantic Current.
sentences.cn: 北大西洋暖流直接影响北半球气候.

sentences.en: The right hemisphere of the brain is the seat of imagination, intuition, creation, and daydreaming.
sentences.cn: 人脑右半球是想象力 、 直觉 、 创造力和幻想的中心.

sentences.en: The Tropic of Cancer is the most northerly latitude in the Northern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 在北半球,北回归线的纬度最高.

sentences.en: This animal is to be found only in the Southern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 这种动物只有在南半球才能找到.

sentences.en: This part generally is in the Eastern Hemisphere.
sentences.cn: 这部分主要位于东半球.

sentences.en: What is the largest city in the southern hemisphere?
sentences.cn: 南半球上哪个城市最大?

sentences.en: Your left cerebral hemisphere controls the right - hand side of your body.
sentences.cn: 你的左半脑控制身体的右半身.

trans.tran_cn: 半球，地球的半球，[解]大脑半球
trans.tran_en: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the equator
